Advanced data
NPC ID1315

Emily works with Kaylee and Tina as a bartender (and most likely the owner) at the Rising Sun Inn in Falador. She sells Asgarnian ale, Wizard's mind bomb, and Dwarven stout which can all be bought for 3 coins each. If you ask for a drink but do not have enough coins, she gets angry and yells at you.

Emily plays a small role in the Recipe for Disaster quest and is also part of Alfred Grimhand's Barcrawl challenge. She is a cheerful woman who is most likely a teenager or in her early twenties.

Emily also has a brother, George Laxmeister. He originally worked in the Rising Sun with her, but he has since left and found a job in the distant Piscatoris Fishing Colony.

Dialogue[edit | edit source]

This article on an NPC has an associated dialogue page.
Click here for a transcript of possible conversations with this NPC.

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • When you use coins on Emily she will respond with, "Thanks!" and will take 1 coin.
  • There was a bug where when you chose Talk-to Emily, you were not able to reach her, therefore you could not talk to her. This has been fixed.
  • If you use a beer glass on Emily she will give you 2 coins.
  • Emily, Kaylee, and Tina replaced a previous character called the Barmaid.
